characters.name: Lucius Caecilius Iucundus
characters.personality: Ambitious, shrewd, but fair in business
characters.background: Born a slave, freed by his master. Now runs successful banking business.
characters.appearance: Wears a simple tunic with a banker's abacus at his belt
characters.speech_style: Formal but pragmatic, mixes Latin business terms
characters.historical_basis: Real person known from wax tablets found in his house

characters.name: Aulus Umbricius Scaurus
characters.background: Built garum empire supplying Rome's elite
characters.appearance: Wears fine linen, shows off wealth with rings
characters.historical_basis: Known from archaeological finds of garum containers

characters.name: Helena
characters.background: Freed slave now running small weaving workshop with other women
characters.appearance: Simple wool stola, hands stained with dye
characters.historical_basis: Based on evidence of textile workshops in Pompeii

characters.name: Marcus Vesonius Primus
characters.background: Third-generation baker, supplies bread to half the town
characters.appearance: Flour-dusted tunic, strong arms from kneading
characters.historical_basis: Based on numerous bakeries found in Pompeii

characters.name: Diocles
characters.background: Thracian slave trained as murmillo gladiator
characters.historical_basis: Based on gladiator barracks and graffiti
